HOME.carousel-description-1: Specially formulated to purify, refresh, and balance your skin. Ideal for combination and oily skin.
HOME.carousel-description-2: Enjoy our solid soaps, ideal for gentle and neutral cleansing.
HOME.carousel-description-3: Relax and enjoy with our bath salts and other products for a spa-like experience at home.
HOME.title-test: Test to Discover Your Skin Type
HOME.test-description: Do you want to know which of the four skin types is yours and the best routine for perfect skin? Take our simple test and find out.
HOME.test-first-step: Wash your face with a gentle cleanser and wait 15 to 30 minutes.
HOME.test-second-step: During this time, do not apply any products.
HOME.test-third-step: Determine your skin type based on the characteristics you observe.
HOME.text-card-1: The right skincare products will keep your skin looking healthy, soft, and hydrated.
HOME.text-card-2: The right skincare products will nourish, repair the skin barrier, and prevent moisture loss.
HOME.text-card-3: With the right products, your skin will become more balanced and appear smoother and blemish-free.
HOME.text-card-4: The right skincare products will balance your skin and help get rid of shine and blemishes.

SKIN.description-page: Our facial products are formulated with natural ingredients, sulfate-free and paraben-free. Each cream and mask is designed to provide deep hydration and balance your skin. With plant extracts like aloe vera and tea tree, we guarantee gentle and effective care for all skin types.

HAIR.description-page: Discover our range of hair products, sulfate-free and full of essential nutrients. From shampoos to serums, our products contain natural ingredients like argan oil, mint, and keratin. Designed to hydrate, strengthen, and revitalize your hair, leaving it soft and manageable.

BODY.description-page: Our body products are enriched with butters and natural oils such as cocoa and lavender. Each cream, lotion, and scrub is formulated to nourish and soften the skin, without harsh chemicals. Enjoy healthy and radiant skin with our natural body treatments.

BATHROOM.description-page: Transform your bath routine with our salts, bombs, and bath oils. Enriched with lavender, jojoba, and citrus extracts, our bath products are perfect for a relaxing and revitalizing experience. Sulfate-free and with natural ingredients, they care for your skin while you enjoy a spa bath at home.

FOOTER.text-newsletter: Stay up to date on new releases, events, and more. We will not share your data with third parties and you can unsubscribe at any time. For more information, see our privacy policy and terms and conditions.
